description: This file defines the TodoScreen composable function for the Android front-end of a to-do list application, including UI components such as task list, input field, filter chips, and task editing functionality.

methods.name: TodoScreen
methods.description: Main composable function that renders the to-do screen with a scaffold containing top app bar, task list, input, and filters.

methods.name: AddTaskRow
methods.description: Composable for the input row allowing users to add new tasks.

methods.name: FilterChips
methods.description: Composable that displays filter options as chips (All, Active, Completed).

methods.name: FilterChip
methods.description: Helper composable for a single filter chip.
